parameters.name: fullName
parameters.shortdesc: The library's path and file name.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new Library

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Library.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Library with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Library with the specified name.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Libraries within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The Library, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Library, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The Library, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Library, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Library in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Library in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Library in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Library with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the Library that follows the desired Library.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Library whose index follows the specified Library in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The Library whose index comes before the desired Library.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Library in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Library in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Library.
Returns the Library with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
